message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is commonly known as depreciation.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see there is a line item specifically labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 45753.36 on 2024-01-30. This is exactly what I'm looking for, as depreciation represents the systematic allocation of the cost of tangible assets over their useful lives.

Therefore, the value of the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life is 45753.36.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45753.36'} }
```
